sentences.en: Although the part about Andrew Jackson is almost certainly apocryphal.
sentences.cn: 虽然其中关于安德鲁·克逊的部分是不足凭信的.

sentences.en: An empty cupboard is no better than an empty cup, she said in an apocryphal aside.
sentences.cn: 空柜子比空杯子好不了多少, 她在边上有深意似地说.

sentences.en: Many are real, and given the creative range of human imagination, some are apocryphal.
sentences.cn: 这些记录许多是真实的并基于人类的想像做了创造性发挥, 有些则是假冒的.

sentences.en: Most of the stories about him are apocryphal.
sentences.cn: 关于他的传闻多属虚构。

sentences.en: Most of the story about his private life was probably apocryphal.
sentences.cn: 有关他私生活的事可能大部分都是虚构的.

sentences.en: Seafarers have long returned with tales — often dismissed as apocryphal — of the ocean abruptly reaching up and snatching at anything in its path.
sentences.cn: 长期以来，海员归来时，都会带来海洋骤然出现，所到之处片甲不留的故事---然而经常被当作是虚构的不为人相信。

sentences.en: The apocryphal story of Columbus and the egg is very interesting.
sentences.cn: 哥伦布竖蛋这个真伪不明的故事十分有趣.

sentences.en: The thing is, they turn out not to be apocryphal.
sentences.cn: 而事实是, 这些并非杜撰.

sentences.en: These are apocryphal advertisements in order to racket from customers.
sentences.cn: 那些都是欺骗顾客花钱的虚假广告。

sentences.en: This may well be an apocryphal story.
sentences.cn: 这很可能是个杜撰的故事。

words.tran_cn: 作者（或真实性、权威性）可疑的著作；旁经

trans.tran_cn: 伪造的，真实性可疑的，作者不明的，次经的
